template.name: Viper managed ViewHolder
template.description: It creates a Viper-managed ViewHolder bound to empty implementation of ViperViewHolderPresenter with appropriate Contract and relatives - Interactor and Routing.

parameter.name: ViewHolder name
parameter.help: The name of the Viper-managed ViewHolder class to create

parameter.name: Create ViewHelper for advanced Android transitions?
parameter.help: Create ViewHelper that allows Routing accessing ViewHolder android.Views to allow Routing perform advanced transitions.

parameter.name: Create related AdapterDelegate?
parameter.help: This option requires to include additional library to your project

parameter.name: Create related entity?
parameter.help: Generate an empty entity for the ViewHolder
